Then, we’ll travel around

the Galapagos Islands,

Tahiti, Australia, Saint Helena and Ascension Island, measuring their exact coordinates along the way.

This will require the cooperation of everyone on board, so I ask you all to do your best.

Yes Sir!

Sounds like we’ll get to observe lots of animals and plants that we can’t find in England.

Are all three of us supposed to stay in this small room?

We’re fine, but the scholar here has likely never been in such small quarters. Is it okay with you?

I’ve dreamed of the chance to explore the world ever since I was small.

What's more, I was given this great opportunity as a scholar,

so it really doesn’t matter

where I sleep. I’ll

sleep anywhere!
